name: Penguin Ice Crush 3D Free - Strategy Puzzle Game
name_original: Penguin Ice Crush 3D Free - Strategy Puzzle Game
description:
Specially designed for your Christmas holidays, A new advance idea puzzle game in which a cute Penguin is stuck on top of some piled solid Ice Rocks. The target or goal is to help him land safely on ground. Tap different shaped ice rocks to remove the Ice blocks and lower the penguin to land safely. Try now and get in love with this entertaining addictive puzzle action game. Its party time!
Game Play:
- There are 20 interesting levels to play
- Level starts with penguin bird stuck on top of Ice Rock piles
- Moves are limited according to game play
- Tap Ice blocks to clear step by step, this will make penguin land on ground safely
- Can tap 2 blocks at one time also (multi-touch)
- Big Solid Ice Rocks cannot be moved or blast
- The level will fail if the penguin falls from height
- The level will success when penguin is safely landed on ground and it will start walking
Game Features:
- Full 3D ice and snow game environment
- Easy user friendly menu navigation
- Excellent 3D Graphics
- Multi touch screen control
- Challenging levels with interesting block arrangements
- Perfectly tuned physics engine
- Addictive Game Play
- Share Challenge your friends!
- Simple yet addictive awesome brain game indeed
- For all type of players age: Kids, teens and adult in family
- Developed in popular Unity Pro 3D Engine
Have fun in home, office or in travel and enjoy this free puzzle game App and we will be happy to read your good feedback news.
